title: Ohio-Based Budros, Ruhlin & Roe CIO Named A Barron's Top 100 Advisor
text:
Budros, Ruhlin & Roe
Daniel Roe named to elite list that identifies the nation's top independent financial advisors
COLUMBUS, Ohio , Oct. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Daniel Roe , Chief Investment Officer for Columbus -based, Budros, Ruhlin & Roe, was named to Barron's 2015 list of the top 100 independent wealth advisors in the United States . This list is based on the quality of the advisors' practices, the volume of assets overseen by the advisors and their teams, and revenues generated for the firms.
"As a group, the Top 100 is an impressive lot, averaging 27 years of industry experience and $3.8 billion in client assets under management," said Steve Garhausen, writer for Barron's.
Roe is a Certified Financial Planner Â® who has been in the financial services industry for more than 25 years. In 1996, he joined Budros, Ruhlin & Roe.
"It is an honor to be a part of the Barron's Top 100 list," Roe said. "I believe that this reflects our entire team's success through our commitment to our clients to help them reach their financial planning and investment management goals."
Roe also said his firm sets itself apart through its disciplined strategies to help clients navigate what he called the various emotions of the market. "I meet with clients and I am directly involved in the strategy of each portfolio," Roe said. "It is the part of our business that I enjoy the most as it is such an important part of helping clients meet their goals."
Roe is ranked in Barron's top 10 in the state of Ohio and has also been named one of "The 150 Best Financial Advisers for Doctors" on Medical Economics ' exclusive list. He has also been profiled and widely Quote: d in The Wall Street Journal and featured in Morningstar Advisor Magazine.
Budros, Ruhlin & Roe was founded in 1979 and is an independently owned firm that serves a multitude of high net worth clients including physicians, professional athletes, business owners, and family trustees who are faced with the issues inherent to managing multi-generational wealth. In addition to individuals and families, Budros, Ruhlin & Roe works with institutional endowments and foundations, corporations, and employee retirement plans.
Editor's Note : P articipants were chosen as America's top independent financial advisors, as identified by Barron's, through a ranking that reflects the volume of assets overseen by the advisors and their teams, revenues generated for the firms and the quality of the advisors' practices. The scoring system assigns a top score of 100 and rates the rest by comparing them with the winner. A ranking of "N" denotes an advisor who is new to the list. Neither the RIA firms nor their employees pay a fee to Barron's in exchange for inclusion in the Top 100.
About Budros, Ruhlin & Roe
Budros, Ruhlin & Roe is a fee-only wealth management firm based in Columbus, Ohio . With $2.2 billion in assets under management, it is the largest independent advisory firm in its category in Central Ohio . Since its inception in 1979, the firm has helped clients achieve financial security and success using its unique wealth building process and globally diversified investment strategy. It is consistently named to the most respected top financial advisors lists published by numerous sources, including Worth magazine, Bloomberg Wealth Manager magazine and Goldline Research, which publishes its rankings in Forbes.
